title: Your Next Executive Request Could Be a $2.3M Deepfake

meta.description: While 73% of employees can't detect modern deepfakes, Sealfie verifies every executive request with one photo. Stop $5B in annual fraud losses. Join 500+ protected companies.

descriptions.homepage: Your executives are 30 seconds from being deepfaked. Sealfie's 1-photo defense stops $2.3M average fraud losses. Join Fortune 500s protecting their reputation.

descriptions.support: 24/7 CISO Support: Instant help protecting executives from deepfakes. Emergency fraud response. Technical setup in 15 minutes.
descriptions.post_register: Welcome to Executive Protection: Your organization is now deepfake-proof. Next: 15-minute CISO briefing and team activation.

faqs.question: Will my board see this as necessary?
faqs.answer: Yes. Directors face personal liability for negligent security practices. We provide board-ready compliance documentation showing you're proactive about fraud prevention.

faqs.question: How does this affect our D&O insurance?
faqs.answer: Positively. Proactive fraud prevention can reduce premiums by up to 15%. We provide insurer-accepted risk mitigation reports.

faqs.question: What if I'm already being targeted?
faqs.answer: We offer emergency deployment in under 4 hours. Our team has stopped ongoing attacks for 50+ companies this year.

faqs.question: Is this just another security product to manage?
faqs.answer: No. Zero training required. Zero IT integration. Your team uses it like taking a photo. We handle all the complex security behind the scenes.

faqs.question: What's the ROI vs traditional security training?
faqs.answer: Traditional training costs $50K+ annually and fails 73% of the time. One prevented $2.3M fraud pays for Sealfie for 12 years.

testimonial: I thought our MFA was bulletproof until I saw the deepfakes targeting our CFO. Sealfie is the only defense that actually works against modern AI fraud.

docs.title: Sealfie: How does it work?
docs.subtitle: Upon registration, after contacting us, the system will be operational within 30 minutes.

stepstart.two: Take a selfie with a neutral expression.
stepstart.tree: Add a short message to the selfie (optional).
stepstart.biometric: Confirm your identity using your smartphone's biometric authentication.

docs.intersteps: The request is processed and additional validations, such as checking for changes in your phone subscription, are performed automatically.

stepvalidate.two: They verify the selfie and the consistency of information.
stepvalidate.tree: Each user adds their own selfie.
stepvalidate.biometric: Each user confirms their identity using their smartphone's biometric authentication.

docs.completed: The requester is guaranteed that only authorized individuals have approved the request. Contact us for customized solutions.
